ing: 1 (6 ounce) package cherry-flavored gelatin mix (such as Jell-OÂ®)
2 (14.5 ounce) cans whole berry cranberry sauce
des: "This is my most requested recipe! It's a wonderful accompaniment to your Thanksgiving or Christmas menu."
ins: Dissolve cherry gelatin mix in boiling water in a bowl; stir cranberry sauce and oranges into gelatin. Refrigerate until mixture is thickened to the consistency of egg whites, about 45 minutes. Mix apple and walnuts into gelatin, transfer to a serving dish or mold, and chill until firm, about 2 more hours.
